item.title: #TIL 2017-10-05 : Simple HTTP server function helper
item.description: Simple HTTP server function helper I use python3 (3.4+) to create a bash function to help me start quickly a simple http server on specified port function server() { local port="${1:-8000}" # Getting port number google-chrome "http://127.0.0.1:$port" # Open URL in browser, could change to firefox --new-tab "http://127.0.0.1:$port" python3 -m http.server $port --bind 127.0.0.1 }
